```{=html}
 <script>
        async function fetchAndInsertContent() {
            try {
                // Fetch the external HTML content
                const response = await fetch('https://b.0-0.plus/blog/md.htm?src=https://raw.githubusercontent.com/saezlab/Factor_COSMOS/main/MOFA_to_COSMOS.md');
                const content = await response.text();

                // Insert the fetched content into the div
                document.getElementById('embedded-content').innerHTML = content;

                // Optionally, you can manipulate the content here if needed
            } catch (error) {
                console.error('Error fetching the content:', error);
            }
        }

        // Fetch and insert content on page load
        window.onload = fetchAndInsertContent;
    </script>






```
